description: LAHORE – The Punjab government has formally launched the registration process for the provision of 20,000 motorcycles on interest-free installments under Chief Minister’s Youth Initiative. The government has asked the students to register in the scheme as soon as possible as an online portal has been launched for the this purpose. Before you learn about […]
title: How students can register for motorcycle scheme in Punjab?

description: ISLAMABAD – The newly-formed government has announced first relief in electricity bills for the month of April 2024 under fuel cost adjustment (FCA). Federal Minister for Energy Sardar Awais Leghari said electricity price has been reduced by Rs3.82, attributing the decline in prices to fuel adjustment. He said the FCA for the running month had […]
title: Eid gift! Pakistan announces major relief in electricity bills for April 2024

description: The Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education (BISE) Rawalpindi has also started issuing roll numbers slips for first annual examinations 2024 of intermediate part-II (12th class). Both regular and private candidates can get their roll number slips from the website of the Rawalpindi board. It is mandatory for all the candidates appearing in the examinations, […]
title: BISE Rawalpindi Class 12 Roll Number slip 2024 download

description: ISLAMABAD – Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif has commended Pakistan Army and personnel of Police and other security agencies for ensuring law and order in the country on the occasion of Eid-ul-Fitr. In a statement, the Prime Minister was appreciative of steps taken by the officers and soldiers of Pakistan Army, the Inspector Generals of Police […]
title: PM Shehbaz commends army, police for ensuring law and order on Eid

description: LAHORE – The education department has announced summer timings for schools in Punjab capital city of Lahore with effect from April 15 (Monday). All educational institutions are set to reopen on April 15 following the end of the Eidul Fitr holidays, which are being observed from April 10 to 14. The schools will observe revised […]
title: New summer timings for schools in Lahore from April 15

description: LASBELA – At least 17 people, including eight members of a same family, were killed after a truck carrying pilgrims fell into a ditch in Hub district, Balochistan. The incident took place on Wednesday night when the alleged negligence by the driver claimed several lives and injured more than 50 others. The zaireen were going […]
title: Eight family members among 17 dead in pilgrims’ truck accident in Hub
